listData.name: The Works Package Home Loan Owner Occupied Variable Interest Only
listData.description: Everything you need in an easy to manage home loan package.

bundles.name: THE_WORKS_PACKAGE
bundles.additionalInfo: The Works Package Home Loan is a package which offers members a range of benefits in relation to their Works Package Home Loan, Credit Card, and banking products.

features.additionalInfo: It comes with a 100% offset account to make your home loan repayments while reducing the interest you pay on your home loan.
Easy access to your cash with our redraw facility.
Split loan option available

eligibility.additionalInfo: The minimum age to open a Loan account is 18.
You must be an Australian citizen or permanent resident to apply.
LVR up to 80% subject to loan size, purpose & security offered (type, location)
LVR up to 98% subject to loan size, purpose, security offered (type, location) and LMI approval, Housing Australia Scheme approval or Family Guarantee approva

fees.name: VALUATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: At cost (minimum $149) payable at funding for costs incurred in obtaining a valuation

fees.name: LEGAL_FEES
fees.additionalInfo: At cost (minimum $440) payable

fees.name: ADDITIONAL_SECURITY_FEES
fees.additionalInfo: Per security

fees.name: CONSENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Does not include solicitors/agents costs

fees.name: HISTORICAL_DOCUMENT_RETRIEVAL
fees.additionalInfo: $20 per hour (min $20)

fees.name: INTEREST_RECALCULATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: $30 per hour (min $30)

fees.name: PROPERTY_SUBSTITUTION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you wish to change the security that is securing your mortgage loan, per property

fees.name: RE-DOCUMENTATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Home loan only

fees.name: SWITCHING_FEES
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you convert your loan to another loan product type

fees.name: LOAN_SECURITY_FEES
fees.additionalInfo: Documents include title search, registration of mortgage documents, and registration of discharge documents

fees.name: OTHER_FEES_AND_CHARGES
fees.additionalInfo: Fees are incurred at the time of the credit union processing the transactions, unless otherwise stated. These fees are in addition to any monthly account keeping fees.
